Class MiniGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.berbils.game.screens.MiniGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class MiniGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    Creates one minigame screen

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Called every rendering tick. Steps the world, destroys scheduled objects, listens for inputs, then spawns new goo shots and updates the HUD.
        Parameters:
        delta - The actual time elapsed since the last update

      • updatePlayerScore

        public void updatePlayerScore(int delta)
        Updates the score of the player by a certain amount
        Parameters:
